program_name: Community Facilities Tribal College Initiative Grants
program_description: This program provides funding to Tribal Colleges to make improvements to their facilities and to purchase equipment.
eligible_applicants: Tribal Colleges in the 2018 Agriculture Improvement Act, Section 7502
how_to_get_started_contact_method: Contact your state Rural Development office for forms, guidance and more.
who_can_answer_questions_contact_method: Your local USDA Rural Development office can help.
governing_program_regulation: Code of Federal Regulation, 7 CFR 3570 Subpart B
note_general_information: Because information changes, always consult official program instructions or contact your local USDA Rural Development office for help.
note_equal_opportunity_statement: USDA is an equal opportunity provider, employer, and lender.
